author: SaigoNoo#3044
SaigoNoo
description: Allow user to download a album in the host who execute RedBot
install_msg: Thanks for installing. Use `[p]mzkgetset` to do setting once the cog is loaded.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores discord IDs as needed for operation. It need to access in the system (hard drive) selected by admin for save mp3 files.
